docs.lead_paragraph: Environmentally conscious investors are using their pocketbooks to protest President Donald Trump's plans to slash environmental regulations, fueling a rally in funds that only invest in companies that meet progressive criteria for sustainability.

headline.print_headline: 'Green' Funds Flush With New Cash, Challenges as Trump Era Dawns
headline.main: 'Green' Funds Flush With New Cash, Challenges as Trump Era Dawns

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal officials said Friday they have approved new measures meant to prevent a repeat of last fall's mass bird deaths in a contaminated former open-pit mine in Montana, including noise-making cannons and radar and laser systems.

headline.print_headline: New Measures Approved to Protect Birds From Contaminated Pit
headline.main: New Measures Approved to Protect Birds From Contaminated Pit

docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's economy secretary said Friday that he looks forward to starting negotiations with the U.S. to update the North American Free Trade Agreement, but his country does not want to see tariffs imposed on goods produced in his country.

headline.print_headline: Mexico's Economy Secretary Opposes Trump Push for Tariffs
headline.main: Mexico's Economy Secretary Opposes Trump Push for Tariffs

docs.lead_paragraph: After U.S. authorities raided Caterpillar Inc's Peoria, Illinois, headquarters as part of a criminal investigation Thursday, the company stated the search was part of an Internal Revenue Service investigation related to profit earned by a parts subsidiary based in Switzerland.

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 400,000 glass knobs that can break while in use are being recalled this week. Other recalled consumer products include pool slides, recreational vehicles, baby jackets and rattles.

docs.lead_paragraph: French carmaker PSA Group is expected to announce Monday that it has purchased General Motors' money-losing European car business, according to two people briefed on the matter.

docs.lead_paragraph: Rene Preval, a low-key technocrat who led Haiti as president during the devastating January 2010 earthquake and a messy and prolonged recovery, has died. He was 74.
